title: DMZ, Vol. 3: Public Works
description: Matty Roth, aspiring photojournalist, continues his one-man mission to report on the war behind the war-the struggle of the civilians caught in this no-man's-land during the Second American Civil War.In PUBLIC WORKS, he's gone deep undercover, posing as an unskilled worker to infiltrate the ranks of Trustwell, Inc., the winner of a lucrative no-bid contract to rebuild Manhattan. Of course he suspects there is more to the situation than meets the eye, but is he prepared for exactly what he might find...or how far he needs to go to find it?Collects DMZ #13-#17.
author: Brian Wood
